judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
peb Curiam,
The decree of the lower Court is affirmed on the able opinion of Judge Biggins dated February 2, 1956, which is reported in 10 Pa. B. & C. 2d 712. Each party shall pay their own costs.
opinions.author: peb Curiam,

attorneys: Joseph W. deFuria, with him deFuria, Larkin and, deFuria, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Shepherd Estate.
Argued November 12, 1957.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
Joseph W. deFuria, with him deFuria, Larkin and, deFuria, for appellant.
Edward D. McLaughlin, for appellee.
January 6, 1958:
